Directions: In a large bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. Crumble beef over mixture; mix well. Shape into 1-1/2-in. balls. Place in a greased 13-in. x 9-in. x 2-in. baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 1 hour, turning once; drain. Combine soups and water; pour over meatballs. Sprinkle with onions. Bake 30 minutes longer or until meat is no longer pink.
Ingredients: 1 (11 ounce) can condensed nacho cheese soup, undiluted
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
